utilitiesContent.title: **PREDICTABILITY – RESPONSIBILITY – EFFICIENCY**
utilitiesContent.hotelLivingGuests: ⚙️ HOTEL-LIVING GUESTS ARE NOT TRANSIENT TOURISTS
utilitiesContent.respectfulResidents: They are respectful long-stay residents who remain for 8, 16, 24 or 32 days.
utilitiesContent.consciousUse: Due to the longer duration of stays and the more personal relationship they establish with your property, these guests tend to be more conscious in their use of resources.
utilitiesContent.temporaryTenants: They feel more like temporary tenants than short-stay visitors — and that makes all the difference.
utilitiesContent.utilityConsumption: ⚡ UTILITY CONSUMPTION IS LOWER AND MORE STABLE
utilitiesContent.energyEfficiency: 💡 ENERGY EFFICIENCY SYSTEMS (such as LED lighting and moderate climate control) are even more effective
utilitiesContent.feelingAtHome: 🌱 FEELING AT HOME, guests naturally adopt more conservative habits
utilitiesContent.accessibleRates: Since Hotel-Living offers accessible rates, guests are usually aware and respectful of the opportunity they are given.
utilitiesContent.balanceAndCare: They know this model depends on balance, care and sustainability — and most act accordingly.
utilitiesContent.lowerTurnover: Thanks to lower room turnover and simplified cleaning protocols, utility usage remains constant and optimized, with fewer peaks in electricity or water demand.

cleaningContent.title: **HOME-STYLE CLEANING – LONG-TERM COMFORT**
cleaningContent.newStandard: 🧼 HOTEL-LIVING MEANS A NEW HOSPITALITY STANDARD
cleaningContent.feelsLikeHome: 🏡 ONE THAT FEELS MORE LIKE HOME.
cleaningContent.approachDescription: Unlike traditional hotels with daily cleaning, our approach reflects the pace of real life.
cleaningContent.lightHelp: Just like someone living at home might receive light help a few times a week, our guests enjoy attentive and discreet care that respects their independence and comfort.
cleaningContent.completeCleaningDesc: A complete room cleaning every 7 days ensures hygiene and freshness, with minimal intrusion.
cleaningContent.lightRefreshDesc: Small optional touch-ups — 🗑️ trash removal, 🧺 light tidying, 🌬️ ventilation — are available, respecting privacy and lifestyle.
cleaningContent.beddingChangeDesc: Sheets and towels are renewed regularly, following home comfort standards.
cleaningContent.benefitsDescription: This model reduces operational costs for hotels, while offering guests a residential experience:
cleaningContent.feelingBelonging: • The feeling of truly belonging — not just staying.

mealsContent.comfortBased: In most cases, the Hotel-Living experience is based on comfort, simplicity and sustainability.
mealsContent.notForLuxury: Our guests are not here for luxury.
mealsContent.residents: They are not tourists. They are long-stay residents looking for a reliable, healthy and affordable meal routine — something that resembles real life at home.
